name: Tranquility (Luicel)
description:
Tranquility is a simple and short 2D platformer/adventure game made by myself for a senior project in high school. It is nothing complicated; just a simple representation of my skill set at the time.

Goal
After the unexplainable shattering of the Tranquility Bell, you are mysteriously summoned to an unknown realm and given a simple task: repair the bell. Failure to do so will result in chaos spreading throughout the universe, ultimately leading to the downfall of humanity. Are you up to the task?

Controls
WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
Arrow Keys - Shield

Left Joystick - Move
South Button - Jump
Right Joystick - Shield

Credits
The font used (Pixel Font) was created by Thaleah from the Unity Asset Store.
Everything else was created by myself, Luicel.
Made in Unity (v2020.3)

Click here to view the source code for the game.
